function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of proactive actions in crisis phase","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to future outbreaks and prolonged recovery time","Mitigation":"Implement proactive measures such as public health protocols, contingency planning, and crisis response strategies","Technologies":"Digital communication tools for stakeholder engagement, data analytics for trend analysis","People":"Managers and decision-makers of affected organizations","Owner":"Senior management and leadership teams"},{"Description":"Dependence on reactive measures","Impact":"Limited capacity to manage future crises and adapt to changing circumstances","Mitigation":"Invest in proactive planning, risk assessment, and scenario-based training","Technologies":"Predictive analytics, scenario modeling tools, crisis management software","People":"Managers and decision-makers of affected organizations","Owner":"Senior management and leadership teams"},{"Description":"Ineffective learning from crisis experiences","Impact":"Missed opportunities for improvement and adaptation to future challenges","Mitigation":"Establish a culture of continuous learning, knowledge sharing, and adaptive response","Technologies":"Learning management systems, knowledge management platforms, collaboration tools","People":"Employees, managers, and stakeholders of food service organizations","Owner":"Organizational leadership and human resources"}]}
